data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Skoracka, Anna, Macuk, Lucyna, Rakowski, Wojciech (2004): New eriophyoid mites (Acari: Eriophyoidea) from sedges in Poland and supplement description of Eriophyes lentiginosus Mitrofanov, Sharonov et Sekerskaja, 1983. Zootaxa 446: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157646
